name: CircuitMaker File
summary: Learn about .CKT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CircuitMaker is no longer developed and has been replaced by Altium Designer, a electronic product design program. Altium Designer provides a unified product development interface and can be used for a more broad range of hardware design that CircuitMaker.

description: Printed circuit board (PCB) design created with CircuitMaker, a circuit layout and design program; can be used to create circuits and test them by running simulations.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ckt file in Kubotek KeyCreator Pro 2021
images.caption: CKT file open in Kubotek KeyCreator Pro 2021
